modify.errorNotFound: Sorry, couldn't find the birthday to remove.
modify.errorInvalidDate: Sorry, the new birthdate provided is not valid.

config.languageError: Language `{{language}}` not supported. Currently, the supported languages are: `en` for English, `pt` for Portuguese, `es` for Spanish and `ko` for Korean.

all.intro: Open the Calendar view, where you can see all the birthdays from the chat groups you're on, by clicking the button below:

errors.empty: No birthdays added yet. Type /help if you're stuck!
errors.notAdmin: Only group administrators can run this command!
errors.needGroup: This command only works in a group.
errors.needPvt: This command only works in a private (DM) chat with me.
errors.missingChatId:
Group id is missing - did you mean to run this command on a group chat?
Otherwise supply the id as the last comma separated param (e.g., `/add John, 1998-04-12, -123456` or `/list -123456`)
errors.internalError: Sorry, something went wrong on my end: `{{message}}`
errors.internalErrorNoMessage: An error occurred, please try again.
errors.notGroupMember: You can't run this command as you are not a member of the group.

validation.dateInvalid: I couldn't understand the birth date, please try again.
validation.yearMissing: Sorry, I didn't understand the birth year of the birthday person, please try again.
validation.nameMissing: Sorry, I didn't understand the name of the birthday person, please try again.

welcomeGroup:
👋 *{{chatTitle}}*!
Hi there! I'm a bot 🤖 here to help you remember everyone's birthdays. 🎉
 To learn more about what I can do, just type /help. Start by adding the first birthday by using the add command with the name and date separated by a comma (e.g., `/add David, 1984-07-01`)
startMessage:
🎂 *Welcome to the Birthday bot!* 🎂
I'm here to help you remember all your friends birthdays. 🤖 You can add me (@BaliBirthdayBot) to a Group Chat or send me direct messages and insert everyone's birthdays by using the `/add` command (e.g., `/add Sam, 1998-04-29`). I will send congratulatory messages when birthdays are due! 🎉 Check some other commands you can use by typing /help.
helpMessage:
Here are some of the commands you can use:
 - /add - Add a new birthday with the name and date separated by a comma (eg, `/add Samuel, 1994-03-21`)
 - /remove - Remove a birthday (eg, `/remove David`)
 - /birthdays - Lists everyone's birthdays, sorted by the nearest date.
 - /ages - Lists everyone, sorted by age.
 - /next - Shows who has the next upcoming birthday!
 - /birthdaybot - Slightly magical command, just tell the bot what you want it to do (eg, `/birthdaybot add Peter on April 15, 1980`).
 - /config - Shows the current configuration for this group. If you are an admin, you can change it by separating the key and value with a comma. (eg, `/config language, en`)
 - /calendar - Opens the Birthday Calendar view.
 - /feedback - Send us your feedback!
configMessage:
Here's this group's configuration:
 \- `language`:  *{{language}}*
 \- `notificationHour`: The earliest the bot will send birthday notifications: *{{notificationHour}}h* \(UTC, 24h format\)
 \- `restrictedToAdmins`: Whether managing birthdays is limited to group administrators: *{{restrictedToAdmins}}*
